trans-unit.source: Passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to enable the modification of a service contract and its context prior to generating code.

Use the ServiceContractGenerationContext object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code.

Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level.
To modify the code at the operation level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"></xref> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
The generator that generates the code for the contract.
The contract description for the contract to be generated.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the contract code to be generated.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"></xref> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
The generator that generates the code for the contract.
The contract description for the contract to be generated.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the contract code to be generated.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex contract code to be generated.
Gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
Use the Contract property to examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the current contract.
Use the ContractType property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract before the code is generated.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the current contract.
Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.

Use the DuplexCallbackType property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract prior to generating code.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"></xref> objects that represent the contract operations.
Use the Operations property to examine or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the contract operations.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"></xref> objects that represent the contract operations.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> that is to generate the contract.
Use the ServiceContractGenerator property to examine or modify the code generator that is to create the contract code.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> that is to generate the contract.
